summary: This bill, the Freedom to Compete Act of 2025 (H.R. 4869), introduced in the House of Representatives by Mr. Williams of Texas, aims to codify Executive Order 14267. This executive order focuses on reducing anti-competitive regulatory barriers. The bill’s short title is the Freedom to Compete Act of 2025, and it specifically states that Executive Order 14267, as published in the Federal Register, will have the force and effect of law.
